backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, notes, access control, and CRUD operations including sorting and ownership checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, involved files, components, and test IDs for recent additions like note likers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles, styling, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind setup defining OKLCH-based light/dark theme tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting theme before render and loading the main React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with error boundary, login screen, profile flow, main feed, and global UI elements.
frontend/src/components/AdminModerationQ: Empty placeholder file for the admin moderation queue dialog.
Simple fixed-position watermark showing the text 'Aman SN'.
frontend/src/components/Feedback.tsx: Shared UI states for loading, empty, and error displays with retry support.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Top-level layout containing header, footer, sidebar trigger, and profile editing entry point.
frontend/src/components/LikeButton.tsx: Renders a like button that triggers a like mutation, updates local liked state, and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that logs users in or out using Internet Identity and handles login edge cases.
frontend/src/components/NoteActions.tsx: Provides star, pin, edit, and delete actions for a note with optional dropdown or inline variants.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Displays a concise note preview with metadata, truncated text, and an embedded like button.
frontend/src/components/NoteForm.tsx: Form modal for creating or editing notes with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/NoteLikersDialog: Dialog showing the list of users who liked a note, with loading, error, and empty states.
Right-side sheet that displays full note details with actions, likes, and likers list.
frontend/src/components/NotesFeed.tsx: Main notes list with search, sorting, pagination, note creation, and note viewer integration.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal form to create or edit a user profile, handling validation and saving via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/SidebarDrawer.ts: Left-side drawer with a settings panel allowing users to toggle dark mode.
frontend/src/components/Toasts.tsx: Wrapper component that renders the global toast provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorization.ts: Empty placeholder file for authorization logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile through the actor with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikedNotes.ts: Manages locally stored liked-note IDs per user, exposing helpers to check and mark likes.
frontend/src/hooks/useNoteLikers.ts: Fetches the list of users who liked a specific note using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Hooks for listing notes and fetching individual notes with polling and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesMutations.ts: Provides create, update, delete, star/pin toggle, and like mutations for notes with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumeRefresh.ts: Refreshes note queries when the page regains focus or is restored from bfcache.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Handles light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, OKLCH-based light/dark theme CSS variables, and global typography and utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/cacheKeys.ts: Provides React Query cache key generators for notes, users, and related data.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes error messages and identifies retryable network-related errors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, OKLCH color tokens, typography, animations, and plugins.
